full_summary:
Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) Paints for the Department of National Defence
=====================================

### Tender Information

* **Contracting Entity:** National Defence
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada
* **Contact Person:** Justin Laundrie, justin.laundrie@forces.gc.ca, (343) 571-8929
* **Notice URL:** N/A
* **Attachment:** [Canadian Federal Government Tender Notice](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36034/w8486-249579-carc_-_rfp_en_amd_001.pdf), [RFQ - CARC Paints](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36034/w8486-249579-rfso-carc-paints.pdf) and [RFQ - CARC Paints (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/36034/w8486-249579-rfso-carc-paints-fr.pdf)

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence invites bidders to submit offers for the procurement of Chemical Agent Resistant Coating (CARC) paints. The delivery of the products will be to 7 CF Supply Depot Lancaster Park and 25 CF Supply Depot Montreal.

The following products are requested:

| Item # | NSN | Description | Quantity (per year) |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | 8010-01-419-1164 | 1 gallon MIL-PRF-22750 Ty II #17925 | 100 |
| 2 | 8030-00-281-2726 | 5 quarts DOD-P-15328 | 200 |
| 3 | 8010-01-589-7077 | 1.25 gallons MIL-PRF-53022 Ty IV | 300 |
| 4 | 8010-01-493-3170 | 3 gallons MIL-DTL-64159 Ty II #34094 | 100 |
| 5 | 8010-01-493-3169 | 3 quarts MIL-DTL-64159 Ty II #34094 | 300 |
| 6 | 8010-01-493-3177 | 3 quarts MIL-D
